info.name: Board_Infinity
info.description: In this backend task, you'll develop an Admin Panel API using Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL to manage user roles and project assignments efficiently. The application will support functionality for Admins, Managers, and Employees, ensuring appropriate access levels and permissions. Admins can create users, manage projects, and maintain audit logs, while Managers and Employees have restricted access based on their roles. Key features include user authentication with JWT, role-based access control, and soft delete functionality. The project will be evaluated on problem-solving skills, proficiency in backend technologies, and adherence to REST API principles.

item.name: Admin

request.description: Allows the creation of the sole Admin user during initial setup.
Admin can sign in using credentials to access the dashboard.
Allows the Admin to securely sign out from the system.

header.value: accessToken=; Path=/; Expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT; HttpOnly; Secure
refreshToken=; Path=/; Expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT; HttpOnly; Secure

request.description: Allows Admin to register new users with roles and credentials.
Retrieve the current logged-in Admin's details from the system.

item.description: The Admin has full control over the system, including creating users, managing projects, assigning roles, viewing audit logs, and restoring soft-deleted resources. Only one Admin exists in the application.

request.description: Users can sign in using their email and password credentials.
The **Signout** feature logs users out, ending their session.

header.value: accessToken=; Path=/; Expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT; HttpOnly; Secure
refreshToken=; Path=/; Expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT; HttpOnly; Secure

request.description: Fetches details of a specific user by their unique ID.
Admin can update user details including role and personal info.
Soft deletes a user, marking them as inactive, not removed.
Permanently deletes a user, removing all associated data.
Restores a previously soft-deleted user to active status.
Fetches the profile details of the currently authenticated user.

item.description: The **Users** feature allows Admins to create, update, and manage users. Users can log in, view their profiles, and access assigned projects, with role-based access controlling their permissions and actions.

item.name: Projects

request.description: Creates a new project, assignable to users by Admins.

response.name: project-created
project2-created

request.description: Retrieves a list of all projects accessible to the user.

response.name: projects-fetched

request.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific project by ID.

item.description: The **Projects** feature enables Admins to create, update, and delete projects. Managers and Employees can view and manage projects assigned to them, with Admins overseeing all project-related actions.

request.description: Records actions and changes for administrative review and tracking.

item.name: Roles

request.description: Assigns a specific role to a user in the system.

item.description: The **Roles** feature manages user permissions and responsibilities. Admins can create and assign roles, such as Admin, Manager, or Employee, controlling access levels and actions each user can perform.
